properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND b.D_LIST_REASON is not null

SELECT a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE , a.B_BLOCK , a.B_CATEGORY_CODE , a.D_LIST_CODE , b.DECISION_CODE , b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE from business a, decision_list b where a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE and b.D_LIST_REASON is not null LIMIT ?,?

SELECT a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE , a.B_BLOCK , a.B_PROFIT , a.B_CATEGORY_CODE , a.D_LIST_CODE , b.DECISION_CODE , b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE , c.HR_ID , c.HR_NAME , c.HR_PHONE , c.HR_EMAIL FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b, HR c where a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND a.B_CODE = c.B_CODE AND a.B_CODE = ?
SELECT b.HR_ID , b.HR_NAME , b.HR_PHONE , b.HR_EMAIL FROM BUSINESS a, HR b where a.B_CODE = b.B_CODE AND a.B_CODE = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND a.B_BLOCK = 1

SELECT a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE , a.B_BLOCK , a.B_CATEGORY_CODE , a.D_LIST_CODE , b.DECISION_CODE , b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND b.D_LIST_REASON is not null AND a.B_BLOCK = 1 LIMIT ?,10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND a.B_BLOCK = 0 AND b.D_LIST_REASON is not null

SELECT a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE , a.B_BLOCK , a.B_CATEGORY_CODE , a.D_LIST_CODE , b.DECISION_CODE , b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND b.D_LIST_REASON is not null AND a.B_BLOCK = 0 LIMIT ?,10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS WHERE BUSINESS.B_NAME LIKE '%' ? '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS WHERE BUSINESS.B_CODE LIKE '%' ? '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS WHERE BUSINESS.B_CATEGORY_CODE LIKE '%' ? '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS A, DECISION_LIST B WHERE A.D_LIST_CODE = B.D_LIST_CODE and B.DECISION_CODE = 3 and B.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE = 3
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUSINESS A, DECISION_LIST B WHERE A.D_LIST_CODE = B.D_LIST_CODE and B.DECISION_CODE < 3 and B.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE = 3 and B.D_LIST_REASON is not null

SELECT a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE , a.B_BLOCK , a.B_CATEGORY_CODE , a.D_LIST_CODE , b.DECISION_CODE , b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND a.B_NAME LIKE '%' ? '%' LIMIT ?,10

SELECT a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE , a.B_BLOCK , a.B_CATEGORY_CODE , a.D_LIST_CODE , b.DECISION_CODE , b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND a.B_CODE LIKE '%' ? '%' LIMIT ?,10

SELECT a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE , a.B_BLOCK , a.B_CATEGORY_CODE , a.D_LIST_CODE , b.DECISION_CODE , b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE a.D_LIST_CODE = b.D_LIST_CODE AND a.B_CATEGORY_CODE LIKE '%' ? '%' LIMIT ?,10

SELECT a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE , a.B_BLOCK , a.B_CATEGORY_CODE , a.D_LIST_CODE , b.DECISION_CODE , b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE A.D_LIST_CODE = B.D_LIST_CODE and B.DECISION_CODE = 3 and B.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE = 3 LIMIT ?,10

SELECT a.B_CODE , a.B_NAME , a.B_OWNER , a.B_NUMBER , a.B_ADDRESS , a.B_PHONE , a.B_BLOCK , a.B_CATEGORY_CODE , a.D_LIST_CODE , b.DECISION_CODE , b.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE FROM BUSINESS a, DECISION_LIST b WHERE A.D_LIST_CODE = B.D_LIST_CODE and B.DECISION_CODE < 3 and B.D_LIST_TYPE_CODE = 3 and B.D_LIST_REASON is not null LIMIT ?,10
